overview: Can you imagine being in a club and ending up being the slave of that hot waiter of your wildest dreams? That's exactly what happens to Ricky in our new clip. Prepare for an intense session of domination with this couple from Jalif Studio! Cristian is a straight young man who visits Dr. Wess to stop smoking. But the evil Dr. Wess will use hypnosis to humiliate him, making him become his private human dog. When you can only obey, you have no choice but to submit to his desires... Cristian’s brother is an asshole that the only thing he does properly is cleaning their house. But things go bad when he disturbs his brother’s friend, Max, a violent Spanish young macho who knows how to have hard fun with rubbish like Cristian’s brother. Max Duran is Mateo Stanford’s personal trainer, an executive who wants to get more buff. What better way to get results than having a good session with the boss on all fours barking like the dog he is?
title: Hard Sex 8
